short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension to remember your netflix profile

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Say goodbye to the Netflix profile page.

With this extension, your browser remembers your Netflix profile at any time and the profile page no longer bothers you.

Github link: https://github.com/batbyR/remember-my-netflix-profile
